==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/1/30/episode-643-january-28-2022 Episode #643: January 28, 2022]</ref>:

*Alex is very excited about the Canadian trucker convoy
*There [https://www.statista.com/statistics/947317/canadian-trucking-industry-total-drivers/ aren't a million truckers] in Canada
*Numbers of participants [https://www.baytoday.ca/business/trucker-convoy-continues-east-to-winnipeg-after-making-overnight-stop-near-regina-4991652 have varied] depending on [https://ottawa.ctvnews.ca/truck-convoy-rolls-into-kingston-ont-1.5756220 who you ask], but it's definitely lower than Alex thinks
*Canada Trucking Association [http://cantruck.ca/canadian-trucking-alliance-statement-to-those-engaged-in-road-border-protests/ released a statement] denouncing and discouraging the convoy
*[https://globalnews.ca/news/8532791/covid-unvaccinated-restrictions-tax-poll/ Ipsos poll] finds that the Canadian public is not opposed to public health measures
*The convoy was organized by Tamara Lich, the secretary of the Western secessionist Maverick Party. The party's leader Jay Hill has been using the convoy as [https://westernstandardonline.com/2022/01/maverick-party-says-it-supports-truckers-right-to-protest-peacefully/ a means to attack Trudeau]
*There are [https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/vaccine-protest-convoy-gofundme-donations-1.6330594 some suspicions] about the money coming in to the convoy's GoFundMe
*Canada Unity is [https://canada-unity.com/mou/ essentially calling for an overthrow of the Canadian government]
*[https://www.thestar.com/news/canada/2022/01/29/small-group-of-protesters-set-up-blockade-at-houlton-woodstock-border-crossing-in-belleville.html Maine/New Brunswick border] crossing blocked
